description:
An easy-carrying, well-ventilated pack for minimalist overnight trips or gear-intensive days. The trampoline suspension creates space between your back and the pack, so cool air can flow through. When it's loaded with food, water and spare layers, the harness and suspension work together to automatically balance flexibility and stiffness in the frame.

  • Body fabric is durable 400-denier polyester ripstop with a PFC-Free DWR for weather resistance
  • FreeFloat dynamic suspension system links the hipbelt to the frame, so it flexes with your body movements
  • Low-profile trampoline style back panel adds ventilation without sacrificing load management
  • Adjustable torso length lets you dial in the fit
  • U-shape zippered access to main compartment
  • Top zippered pocket with reflective attachment points, key clip, and internal zippered security pocket
  • Dual side stretch mesh pockets
  • Extra-large hipbelt pockets provide secure, easy to access to essentials
  • Hydration sleeve with SpeedClip hydration hanger, compatible with Gregory's 3D Hydro reservoirs (reservoir not included)
  • Attachment loop and shock lock for trekking poles or an ice axe
  • Designed for loads up to 18.1kg/40lbs
name: Gregory Jade 43 Backpack - Women's
